item.title: Reclaiming Email with Astroid
item.description: Migrating Imap, Gmail and Exchange, mail accounts from GUI clients to Astroid Background Initially, I had planned this post to start with a brief history of the decline of email clients for Linux. That quickly got out of hand, and was therefore spun out into a post of its own (TBD). To keep things brief. Thanks to the incredible ineptitude of the Thunderbird steering committee, I ended up requiring a new mail client.
